summary: REQ-19/REQ-20/REQ-21 PWA wiring appears implemented via new manifest (frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest), service worker (frontend/public/sw.js), offline fallback page (frontend/public/offline.html), and index.html updates to link manifest, set theme-color, add Apple meta tags, and register the SW. However, the required icon image assets referenced by the manifest/HTML are not present in the diff summary, and the diff indicates many unrelated frontend changes not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide the required PWA icon images (192x192, 512x512, and maskable 512x512) in the frontend static assets so the manifest icons resolve.
missing_requirements.reason: The manifest and index.html reference /assets/generated/pwa-icon-192.dim_192x192.png, /assets/generated/pwa-icon-512.dim_512x512.png, and /assets/generated/pwa-icon-maskable-512.dim_512x512.png, but the diff summary does not show these image files being added/modified, so they may be missing.

hallucinated_features.description: Large-scale frontend redesign and feature work (routing/guards, dashboards/pages, Tailwind/theme changes, React Query hooks, multiple component/page modifications) beyond PWA enablement.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is limited to PWA manifest + service worker + HTML metadata/registration and explicitly requests no auth behavior changes and no backend changes; the diff summary lists many unrelated frontend file modifications.
